meanings.definition: A person who engages in counterespionage.
meanings.sent1: The counterspies worked tirelessly to protect their country's secrets.
meanings.sent2: The government hired counterspies to prevent enemy spies from stealing classified information.
meanings.sent3: The counterspies decided to play a game of cat and mouse with the foreign agents.
meanings.sent4: In the world of espionage, counterspies are the silent guardians of national security.
meanings.sent5: The image of counterspies in movies often involves high-tech gadgets and thrilling chases.
